question: What is the correct recipe for a small, light ice, Make it a Triple 7 Smooth 7?

answerChoices.choice1: 1 scoop Smooth 7 flavor, 4 espresso shots, fill to the 8oz line with Smooth Mix
answerChoices.choice2: 1 scoop Smooth 7 flavor, 6 espresso shots, fill to the 12oz line with Smooth Mix
answerChoices.choice3: 2 scoop Smooth 7 flavor, 7 espresso shots, fill to the 8oz line with Smooth Mix
answerChoices.choice4: 2 scoop Smooth 7 flavor, 6 espresso shots, fill to the 12oz line with Smooth Mix

question: What is the correct recipe for a medium hot/iced almond milk Brunette?

answerChoices.choice1: 2 scoops Brunette flavor, 2 espresso shots, almond milk
answerChoices.choice2: 1/2 scoop Brunette flavor, 1/2 scoop chocolate, 4 espresso shots, almond milk
answerChoices.choice3: 1 scoop Brunette flavor, 1 scoop chocolate, 2 espresso shots, almond milk
answerChoices.choice4: 1 scoop Brunette flavor, 1/4 scoop chocolate, 2 espresso shots, almond milk

question: If no premix flavor bottles are available, what is the correct recipe for a small iced sugar-free German Chocolate?

answerChoices.choice1: 1/2 scoop SF coconut, 1/2 scoop SF caramel, 2 espresso shots, Mocha Mix
answerChoices.choice2: 1/2 scoop SF chocolate, 1/4 scoop SF coconut, 1/4 scoop SF caramel, 2 espresso shots, Smooth Mix
answerChoices.choice3: 1/2 scoop SF coconut, 1/2 scoop SF caramel, 2 espresso shots, Smooth Mix
answerChoices.choice4: 1/3 scoop SF chocolate, 1/3 scoop SF coconut, 1/3 scoop SF caramel, 2 espresso shots, Smooth Mix

question: What is the correct recipe for a large hot oat milk Smooth 7?

answerChoices.choice1: 1 scoop Smooth 7 flavor, 4 espresso shots, Smooth Mix
answerChoices.choice2: 2 scoop Smooth 7 flavor, 6 espresso shots, Smooth Mix
answerChoices.choice3: 2 scoop Smooth 7 flavor, 6 espresso shots, oat milk
answerChoices.choice4: 2 scoop Smooth 7 flavor, 4 espresso shots, oat milk

question: What is the correct recipe for a medium hot/iced skim milk White Chocolate Mocha?

answerChoices.choice1: 1/2 scoop white chocolate, 1/2 scoop dark chocolate, 2 espresso shots, skim milk
answerChoices.choice2: 1 scoop white chocolate, 1 scoop dark chocolate, 2 espresso shots, skim milk
answerChoices.choice3: 2 scoops sugar-free white chocolate, 2 espresso shots, skim milk
answerChoices.choice4: 2 scoops white chocolate, 2 espresso shots, skim milk
